articles.title: Dallas Stars unveil 'Blackout' alternate jersey
articles.description: The Dallas Stars unveiled a new Blackout alternate uniform for the upcoming season.
articles.content:
article
As Dallas Stars fans are still thinking about the team’s run to the Stanley Cup Final, they were given a treat Wednesday, as the Stars unveiled a new Blackout alternate uniform for the upcoming season.
This will be the first time since 2006 t... [1101 chars]

articles.title: Waiting for you: Please come home, affluent New Yorkers
articles.description: To all 300,000 or so New Yorkers who left the city last March when COVID struck, plenty of whom are still biding time in the Hamptons and Connecticut and New Jersey or parts unknown, this is a pointed and personal appeal: Come back home.
articles.content: Your city, and all the people still here, those who couldn’t leave, need your help. You still love New York, don’t you? You proudly lived here, even as you groused as we all do about the craziness, the smells, the traffic, the noise?...

articles.title: Woman gets $325K settlement in 2018 NJ beach brawl bust
articles.description: A Philadelphia woman punched out by cops during a wild, 2018 caught-on-video beach brawl in New Jersey is getting the last laugh.
articles.content:
A Philadelphia woman punched out by cops during a wild, 2018 caught-on-video beach brawl in New Jersey is getting the last laugh.

articles.title: Bacterial Infection Spread At NJ Hospital As COVID-19 Hit: CDC
articles.description: Bacterial Infection Spread At NJ Hospital As COVID-19 Hit: CDC - Mendham-Chester, NJ - A new CDC report says a New Jersey hospital dealt with a potentially troubling bacterial infection just as the COVID-19 crisis hit.
articles.content:
NEW JERSEY – A new CDC report says a New Jersey hospital dealt with a potentially troubling bacterial infection just as the COVID-19 crisis hit this year.

articles.title: New Jersey hospital faced superbug outbreak amid Covid surge
articles.description: Coronavirus hospitalizations: A hospital in New Jersey faced a superbug outbreak during a Covid-19 surge.
articles.content:
As a New Jersey hospital faced a surge of Covid-19 cases in the spring, another deadly foe was quietly spreading among its patients: a drug-resistant bacterial infection.
